title: New: The Neighbourhood – Silver
content: From the humble beginnings of 2012’s Female Robbery, it’s been a whirlwind two years or so for LA five piece The Neighbourhood. Sold out tours, unique, ground-breaking appearances on prime-time TV shows and a debut album that broke the top 40 in the US, culminating in the announcement of a new album, titled  #000000 & #FFFFFF (The Black And The White). Along with the news of a their sophomore LP, they also debuted new track, Silver, a real change in direction for the group. Maintaining much of the slick, R&B production values that initially shot them to fame, there’s an insatiable hunger and maturity to Silver; it’s a track that’s tearing down boundaries and placing limitless potential in their own hands. Check it out below, and catch them supporting The 1975 at a bunch of UK shows next year.
